### Virtual Memory  {.smaller}


* modern <em>hardware-supported</em> memory protection mechanism
* via <em>table</em>: OS decides <em>what memory program sees</em> 

   * whether it's read-only or not

* granularity of <em>pages</em> --- typically 4KB 
<hr class="vspace" />
* not in table --- segfault (OS gets control)
